product.name: Herbs of Light California Poppy 1 oz Liquid
product.description: California poppy is flowering plant that is a known adaptogen, meaning it can help combat stress and promote relaxation. It may also improve the health of the adrenal system, which is responsible for managing hormonal responses to both internal and external stress. Additionally, California Poppy may promote sleeping, ease aches, and prevent disease of the bladder and liver.

product_reviews.review_text: taste is so horrible, even mixed with something else that it's unbearable

product.name: Herb Pharm California Poppy - Nervous System 1 fl oz Liq
product.description: Herb Pharm prepares its California Poppy Nervous System extract from fresh (undried) whole Eschscholzia californica plants (root, leaf & flower) which are Certified Organically Grown on Herb Pharm's own farm without the use of chemical fertilizers, pesticides or herbicides. To assure optimal extraction of bioactive compounds, the plants are hand-harvested while in full flower and are then taken directly to our laboratory and promptly extracted while still fresh and succulent. Herb Pharm California Poppy plants are never fumigated or irradiated.

product_reviews.review_title: Great for every now and then
product_reviews.review_text: I put about 35 drops in the first night it worked-helped me get to sleep and stay asleep but didn't affect dreams. The next time I took 30 and didn't really notice it helping me. I then took 50 drops the next night and it worked again. Therefore, I had to keep increasing the dose for it to work because I built up a tolerance to it immediately. I would get this but only for an every now and then thing-not for every night because you'll have to increase the doses and that'll get expensive...

I have occasional work-related anxiety issues and was considering asking my doctor for pharmaceutical ant--anxiety medication. I am so glad I tried this first! It alleviates anxiety without making me drowsy. I can think clear again and deal with the issue at hand. Brilliant stuff. I will order more. I took the double recommended dose.

Dreamland, come hither. This tincture (or extract) works well. I used it exclusively to help me wind down before bed time prior to my discovering the wonders of melatonin. I still keep it around and like it better than melatonin on some levels. Such as, it doesn't affect dream quality nor does it give me any brain fog which melatonin can do, even at low doses with long-term use.  Herb Pharm is a very trusted brand.

I also read about this in a health magazine and thought I'd try it.  I've been waking up every 1 to 1 1/2 hours and could not sleep through the night.  Completely exhausted every day.  Had tried melatonin, even a doctor prescribed sleeping pill (that did not work at all) and so tried this, anything to get a decent night's sleep.  The first night I put 10 drops in a cup of tea (that was the amount listed in the article, I did not see any recommended amount on the product) and slept 9 hours.  Woke up refreshed and alert for the first time in over a year.  Been taking it for two weeks now and it's working great.  Highly recommend!!

this high-quality supplement from poppy is from the whole flowering plant extract, which means that the composition is of all the active plant ingredients. it is certified organic, shows large range of benefits for the nervous system. It improves and supports sleep and relaxation, without any concerns about causing addiction.

Wanted to try because I love poppies! I had read the reviews that it was helpful with sleep and I can attest to its relaxing properties. Unwinds the mind and relaxes my muscles.  I had not tried herb pharm before but see that this  is a well made tincture.Now  I am curious to see what else I can try from this brand. I herb really is a fun place to look for new things to try!

I have to be honest about the effectiveness- This product does help me sleep, however, the next day my stomach feels as though I'd eaten candy on an empty stomach and I have a slight headache and groggy feeling. I only take this at night approx.  30 to 60 minutes before bed, 20-30 drops. I don't take it a few times a day as the label recommends. So, it helps me sleep through the night but makes me feel like I'd consumed alcohol once I wake up in the morning. I would do a lot of research on long-term effects/side-effects before taking this

I found that my sleep was much deeper as well with the CA poppy. I have not used it for pain as of yet - just sleep. My Son was using Melatonin and I asked him to try this. He also said his sleep was deeper with CA Poppy and he did not feel groggy the next day. Also his anxiety has calmed down as well. I would recommend this for anyone looking for better sleep and something to give a relaxing state, not for pain relief.
not effective for pain or sleeplessness, in my case. caused some imbalance for me.

what ia difference i have noted with CA poppy - getting up less times during the night, and more deep, restorative, REM sleep  - from the first night i took this.  i am also impressed with HerbPharm quality.

product.description: Featuring Naturally-Occurring Protein and Antioxidants Perfect for Adding Extra Greens and Nutrients to Smoothies, Shakes, or Yogurt Great Addition to a Healthy and Active Lifestyle Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans  California Gold Nutrition® Superfoods Organic Spirulina Powder is exclusively sourced from from India and is grown under pristine, lab-controlled conditions. The flavor of spirulina is typical of greens with mild grassy notes, making it mellow enough to pair well with a wide range of fruits and veggies, like apple, banana, celery, lemon, mint, and spinach.

product_reviews.review_text: I mix a bag of this with chlorella and amla for a potent supergreen powder for my morning smoothie.  When the batch is finished, I'll alter with another recipe of green tea, moringa and mushroom powder.  These days, to provide more variation, I would have both recipes available at the same time, and serve them on alternate days.  Hope that helps.

Best supplement
I love this supplement because of its ingredients, quality, size of packaging and benefits. It is a great antioxidant and has hood fiber, amino acids and these help boost your mood and energy. This also helps with blood pressure. The taste is peanut like and I love it. I usually add this to my protein shake before a

So glad I purchased this, I use it daily and add have it on recurring order so I get a new shipment monthly. Aside from adding a tablespoon to my morning smoothie, I also like to sprinkle some on my yogurt, fruit bowls, overnight oats, and even when I make my mighty greens soup.

product_reviews.review_title: High-Quality Organic Spirulina for Daily Nutrition
product_reviews.review_text: California Gold Nutrition's Organic Spirulina Powder is a fantastic addition to my smoothies for an extra boost of nutrients. It's rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, making it perfect for daily use. The powder mixes well without clumping, and I appreciate that it's organic. Great for anyone looking to enhance their diet naturally!

I've been using organic spirulina powder and appreciate its nutrient density and natural origin. It's packed with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, which have been a boost to my overall energy levels and immune support. The taste is quite strong, but it blends well into smoothies and juices. While it can be a bit pricey, the organic certification and health benefits make it a valuable addition to my diet.

This Spirulina Algae Powder I use with my morning juice, and i feel it has benefited me with overall strength and has positive effect on energy levels in my body, by detoxifying. 

After consuming it, the stool tends to become green in color, but otherwise it's okay.

I love this brand and will be an eternal customer of this brand. I make a shot every morning with ginger and turmeric and macha. I drink it every morning. I use it to season salads too. Just love. I highly recommend. If my review helped you please click yes.

The blend of vitamins and minerals provides comprehensive support for overall beauty and wellness. Since using it, I've noticed significant improvements in the strength and appearance of my hair and nails. Plus, the easy-to-swallow capsules make it hassle-free to incorporate into my daily routine.

My first time trying spirulina. Flavor isn't too strong but it's not great. Tastes oceany, it is algae after all. I'm hoping the benefits will offset the flavor. I just started taking in smoothies 6 days ago so I haven't seen improvements yet but will update my review when I do.

The quality is great but you gotta get used to the taste and smell, it's pretty rough. 
With all that said, it helped me and my health improved, packaging not very comfortable, I've mixed it with some other ingredients so I can drink it. I suppose that's how it's supposed to taste, but.. well

California Gold Nutrition® Superfoods Organic Spirulina Powder is a true gem for health enthusiasts. Here's why it's worth adding to your wellness routine:

🌟 Naturally Occurring Protein: Spirulina is packed with plant-based protein, making it an excellent addition to smoothies, shakes, or yogurt. 🌿 Antioxidant Boost: It's rich in antioxidants, supporting overall health and vitality. 🌱 Vegan-Friendly: Suitable for vegetarians and vegans, this organic spirulina powder aligns with a healthy and active lifestyle.

Overall, I'd give it a 👍 thumbs up of 4.5/5

I believe this product caused me to have pimples on my forehead. Just after using it i started getting small white head pimples on my forehead and after stopping it after 1-2 weeks the pimples also went away. I'm not 100 percent confident that this product caused the reaction but i think the chances are high. Unfortunately i didn't use it long enough to judge the benefits. The taste was alright.

hi quality, I love spirulina . The size is perfect. The packaging is great. It has many benefits. It's really good for your skin. If anyone wants clear skin this is great. It has so much health benefits and it's really good. Just added into a drink and ask before you order and do your research, but it is really good and I like this brand a lot.

Spirulina, a blue-green algae packed with nutrients, has been a fantastic addition to my health and wellness routine. Here's why I'm impressed with this superfood:

### **Nutrient Powerhouse:**
Spirulina is truly a nutritional powerhouse. It's rich in protein, vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, making it an excellent supplement for overall health. The high protein content, especially, is impressive, providing all essential amino acids in a plant-based form, which is perfect for vegetarians and vegans.

### **Energy Boost:**
One of the most noticeable benefits I've experienced since taking spirulina is an increase in energy. I take it in the morning, either in tablet form or mixed into a smoothie, and it helps me feel more alert and energized throughout the day. It's a great natural alternative to caffeine.

### **Detoxifying Properties:**
Spirulina is known for its detoxifying effects, particularly its ability to bind with heavy metals and help flush them out of the body. I feel that my digestion has improved, and I experience fewer digestive issues since incorporating spirulina into my diet. It gives a sense of internal cleanliness and overall well-being.

### **Immune Support:**
The immune-boosting properties of spirulina are another major benefit. It's packed with antioxidants like phycocyanin and beta-carotene, which help protect the body from oxidative stress and support the immune system. I've noticed that I've been getting fewer colds and generally feel healthier since I started using it regularly.

### **Skin and Hair Health:**
Spirulina's high levels of antioxidants and essential fatty acids have had a positive effect on my skin and hair as well. My skin looks clearer and more radiant, and my hair feels stronger and shinier. It's like giving your body a nutrient-rich beauty boost from the inside out.

### **Versatility in Use:**
One of the things I love about spirulina is its versatility. It's available in both powder and tablet form, making it easy to incorporate into different aspects of my diet. I add the powder to smoothies, juices, or even sprinkle it on salads. The tablets are convenient for when I'm on the go and need a quick nutrient boost.

### **Taste:**
The taste of spirulina is something that takes a little getting used to. It has a strong, earthy, and somewhat seaweed-like flavor, which might not be appealing to everyone. However, when mixed into smoothies with other strong flavors like banana or citrus, the taste becomes much more palatable.

### **Conclusion:**
Spirulina is a fantastic superfood that offers a wide range of health benefits, from boosting energy and immunity to improving skin and hair health. While the taste might be an acquired one, the benefits far outweigh any initial hesitation. Whether you're looking to enhance your diet, detoxify your body, or simply add a powerful nutrient boost to your daily routine, spirulina is definitely worth

I've been using the California Gold Nutrition Organic Spirulina Powder, and it's fantastic! The quality is top-notch, and the size is perfect for daily use, it has almost no taste 🌿 The spirulina ingredient is fresh and blends easily into my smoothies. The packaging is sturdy and keeps the powder fresh. I've noticed a boost in my energy levels and overall wellness since I started using it. Highly recommend this product for anyone looking to add a high-quality superfood to their diet to detox and get the other benefits ! 👍

I have been wanting to incorporate more spirulina in my diet. One of my favorite ways is to add a tsp to a glass of water with citrus juice and sweetener. Other seaweed powders get a little chalky and thick, but this one seems to dissolve well and doesn't have a strong fishy smell or flavor.

This product is horrible! It really messed up my body, so that means that this spirulina has BMAA, a toxin in many spirulina. This junk is from India. You only want spirulina from Taiwan and maybe Korea.
I have been adding this and chorella to my protein shakes everyday and I have noticed a complete disappearance of my sweet tooth. Absolutely no cravings. I've also noticed less bloating.

Spirulina, a blue-green algae packed with nutrients, has been a fantastic addition to my health and wellness routine. Here's why I'm impressed with this superfood:

### **Nutrient Powerhouse:**
Spirulina is truly a nutritional powerhouse. It's rich in protein, vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, making it an excellent supplement for overall health. The high protein content, especially, is impressive, providing all essential amino acids in a plant-based form, which is perfect for vegetarians and vegans.

### **Energy Boost:**
One of the most noticeable benefits I've experienced since taking spirulina is an increase in energy. I take it in the morning, either in tablet form or mixed into a smoothie, and it helps me feel more alert and energized throughout the day. It's a great natural alternative to caffeine.

### **Detoxifying Properties:**
Spirulina is known for its detoxifying effects, particularly its ability to bind with heavy metals and help flush them out of the body. I feel that my digestion has improved, and I experience fewer digestive issues since incorporating spirulina into my diet. It gives a sense of internal cleanliness and overall well-being.

### **Immune Support:**
The immune-boosting properties of spirulina are another major benefit. It's packed with antioxidants like phycocyanin and beta-carotene, which help protect the body from oxidative stress and support the immune system. I've noticed that I've been getting fewer colds and generally feel healthier since I started using it regularly.

### **Skin and Hair Health:**
Spirulina's high levels of antioxidants and essential fatty acids have had a positive effect on my skin and hair as well. My skin looks clearer and more radiant, and my hair feels stronger and shinier. It's like giving your body a nutrient-rich beauty boost from the inside out.

### **Versatility in Use:**
One of the things I love about spirulina is its versatility. It's available in both powder and tablet form, making it easy to incorporate into different aspects of my diet. I add the powder to smoothies, juices, or even sprinkle it on salads. The tablets are convenient for when I'm on the go and need a quick nutrient boost.

### **Taste:**
The taste of spirulina is something that takes a little getting used to. It has a strong, earthy, and somewhat seaweed-like flavor, which might not be appealing to everyone. However, when mixed into smoothies with other strong flavors like banana or citrus, the taste becomes much more palatable.

### **Conclusion:**
Spirulina is a fantastic superfood that offers a wide range of health benefits, from boosting energy and immunity to improving skin and hair health. While the taste might be an acquired one, the benefits far outweigh any initial hesitation. product.name: Silymarin Liver Health Complex, Milk Thistle Extract with Curcumin, Artichoke, Dandelion, Ginger, Black Pepper, 360 Veggie Capsules by California Gold Nutrition
product.description: California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex Featuring Milk Thistle Extract plus Dandelion, Artichoke, Curcumin C3 Complex®, Ginger, and BioPerine® Supports Liver Health* Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility 100% Gold Guarantee  Your liver plays a vital role in your body, as its main function is to filter the blood and remove any waste products or harmful toxins. For this reason, it’s important to take good care of your liver. California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex uses natural herbal extracts from milk thistle, turmeric, and other plants to help support liver health.* Milk Thistle Benefits Milk thistle (Silybum marianum ) is a flowering herb known for its potential health benefits. Silymarin, an extract taken from the seeds of the milk thistle plant, has antioxidant properties which may help protect the liver from certain toxins to promote a healthy detoxification process.* This supplement combines milk thistle with other liver-supporting and antioxidant-rich herbal extracts, like dandelion, turmeric, artichoke, and ginger to offer a full range of support for your liver.* California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Comple x is formulated with 5 herbal extracts and BioPerine®, a black pepper extract that helps improve absorption. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. Third-Party Tested Our products undergo quality testing where they are evaluated by an independent ISO-certified lab using scientifically-validated test methods to ensure authenticity, purity, and potency of ingredients. For added transparency, we make the results available to you in our iTested Verified Reports so you can see for yourself. Check out the iTested Report  for this product to see the analysis.
